name: Nutty Brown Rice Salad
author: Jackie Wood
summary: This delicious cold rice salad has the great flavors of brown rice, fresh veggies, and chopped raw almonds. This has replaced high fat, low nutrition picnic salads in this household.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
¼ cup chopped green bell pepper
¼ cup chopped red bell pepper
¼ cup chopped yellow bell pepper
directions: Combine the rice and water in a small saucepan; bring to a boil over high heat
Cover, and reduce the heat to medium-low
Simmer until the rice is tender, and the liquid has been absorbed, 45 to 50 minutes
Remove from heat and allow to cool
Place cooled rice in a large bowl
Stir in the kidney beans, red onions, mushrooms, broccoli, bell peppers, and almonds; season with pepper
Toss salad with the Italian dressing and olive oil
Chill for at least one hour before serving
